ygData.subject: Re: Will the Bard get better....
ygData.msgSnippet: Have a little faith in your bard friend.  I myself was stuck at 15 and 16 for quite a while.  I don t know it seems like the a big speedbump in your leveling
ygData.messageBody:
Have a little faith in your bard friend. I myself was stuck at 15 and 16
for quite a while. I don't know it seems like the a big speedbump in your
leveling progress. Once you make 17 things start rolling again. That's
where I am at now. The best suggestion is to make sure yur twisting in
Unrest and group as much as you can. Even a single partner makes the two
of you very effective. I got to level 16 partnering with my lvl 15 druid
friend.

Treilanin - Bard of Kelethin - Honour Guard - Karana Server
